title: How to Make Non Fat Blueberry Muffins

steps.headline: Grease twelve muffin pan cups or place 12 cupcake liners in your muffin pan.
Combine flour with baking soda, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a large bowl.
Add egg whites and milk in a medium bowl, then beat together until smooth.
Add egg and milk mixture into the bowl of dry ingredients.
steps.description: Mix everything together either by hand or with a beater on a low setting.

steps.headline: Add the blueberries once mixture is thoroughly mixed.
steps.description: Add a little bit at time, then gently stir with a spoon or spatula, then repeat until you've added all of the blueberries.

steps.headline: Spoon mixture into the muffin pan, filling each cup about 2/3 of the way.
Bake for 15-20 minutes.
steps.description: Use a toothpick to check if they're done. If the toothpick comes out clean, remove the muffins from the oven. If the toothpick is gooey, keep baking the muffins for a couple more minutes or until the toothpick comes out clean.

steps.headline: Let the muffins cool for 5-10 minutes, then serve.

text: Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C).  Grease twelve muffin pan cups or place 12 cupcake liners in your muffin pan.  Combine flour with baking soda, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a large bowl.  Add egg whites and milk in a medium bowl, then beat together until smooth.  Add egg and milk mixture into the bowl of dry ingredients. Mix everything together either by hand or with a beater on a low setting. Add the blueberries once mixture is thoroughly mixed. Add a little bit at time, then gently stir with a spoon or spatula, then repeat until you've added all of the blueberries. Spoon mixture into the muffin pan, filling each cup about 2/3 of the way.  Bake for 15-20 minutes. Use a toothpick to check if they're done. If the toothpick comes out clean, remove the muffins from the oven. If the toothpick is gooey, keep baking the muffins for a couple more minutes or until the toothpick comes out clean. Let the muffins cool for 5-10 minutes, then serve.  Finished.
